Installation gudie:

```
cd DS-whois
pip3 install .
```

Usage:
```
DSwhois google.com
```
Output:
```
{
    "created": "1997-09-15 04:00:00",
    "date_checked": "2019-03-11 19:06:37",
    "domain_name": "google.com",
    "expires": "2020-09-13 21:00:00",
    "modified": "2018-02-21 18:36:40",
    "registrar": "MarkMonitor Inc."
}
```
